title: Help ID this font used by Marcel Broodthaers
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090707104942im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Marcel_BroodthaersfigEDIT_3963.jpg)

What font is this in? I’m trying to figure out what a “fig. 2” would look like with this design. Thanks a lot.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Marcel\_BroodthaersfigEDIT.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090707104942/http:/typophile.com/files/Marcel_BroodthaersfigEDIT.jpg) | 92.27 KB |
author: postbrothers

comments.content: Closest thing I can imagine is [Stencil Full](http://web.archive.org/web/20090707104942/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/2rebels/stencil_full_normal/), but it’s possible that it’s not a font at all.
